dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You are game developer and now you are developing your game.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: ( Why L.I.F.E. is here? Am I dreaming? )

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: You don't know where you are? Hmmm...Nevermind!

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: You are in FOODLANDER. The land with food and magic.

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: Let me introduce myself. I am L.I.F.E. And you?

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: Ok. [Error can't retrieve data] I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: There is no time. This world has been invaded by viruses.

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: The viruses name are "Moustache" and It was led by D.E.A.D.

dialogues.speaker: L.I.F.E.
dialogues.text: The viruses made everyone in this world
